author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Bathroom sink drain assembly tip…I use Oatey stain-free plumbers putty for certain projects. Typically a 1/2 inch bead is perfect. And I don’t over tighten the rubber gasket, which can cause leaks. For more detailed bathroom plumbing tips visit homerepairtutor.com 🔥#plumbing #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Bathroom Sink Drain Assembly Tip - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
